name: Jeht
title: Drifting Sand, Drifting Dreams: Jeht
desc: "Here's a thousand hugs! We will meet again!"\n"May we meet again under a lovelier sun."

skills.desc:
This card will record the number of cards discarded from your Support Zone during this match as Sophistication points. (Max 6 points)
After your characters use an Elemental Burst: If this card has recorded at least 6 Sophistication points, discard this card and attach Sand and Dreams to your active character.
